$type: LOTR.SharedData.Package.DataPackage`1[[System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[LOTR.SharedData.Cards.CardLocalization, LOTR.SharedData, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], LOTR.SharedData, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

DataSet.Title: Advance Warning
DataSet.Text: Preparation: Exhaust the next Enemy that Sauron plays.

DataSet.Title: Against the Shadow
DataSet.Text: Power: Reduce your Threat by 1 for each Enemy in play.

DataSet.Title: Ambush
DataSet.Text: Action:Exhaust an enemy.

DataSet.Title: Aragorn
DataSet.Text: Power: Spend 1 resource to ready Aragorn.

DataSet.Title: Arwen
DataSet.Text: Upkeep: Heal 1 damage from a character.

DataSet.Title: A Watchful Peace
DataSet.Text: Power: Reduce a player's Threat by 3.

DataSet.Title: Barliman Butterbur
DataSet.Text: Upkeep: 50% chance to draw 1 card.

DataSet.Title: Beorn
DataSet.Text: Stalwart. Limited Action: Beorn gets +3 ATK and gains Fleeting.

DataSet.Title: Beorn's Hospitality
DataSet.Text: Action: Heal 3 damage to a Character.

DataSet.Title: Bill the Pony
DataSet.Text: While you control Sam Gamgee, Bill the Pony has -2 cost. Upkeep: Gain 1 Resource.

DataSet.Title: Blade of Gondolin
DataSet.Text: Attached character gets +1 ATK.

DataSet.Title: Borne Aloft
DataSet.Text: Preparation: Return the next ally that is destroyed to your hand.

DataSet.Title: Bow of the Galadhrim
DataSet.Text: Attach to a Ranged character. Attached character gains +1 Attack and Quick.

DataSet.Title: Burst Into Song
DataSet.Text: Preparation: After a character you control takes damage, move it.

DataSet.Title: Close Call
DataSet.Text: Preparation: The next time a character you control would take damage, cancel that damage.

DataSet.Title: Elrond
DataSet.Text: Upkeep: Heal 1 damage from a character.

DataSet.Title: Elrond's Council
DataSet.Text: Action: Reduce your Threat by 2.

DataSet.Title: Elrond's Counsel
DataSet.Text: Action: Reduce your Threat by 2.

DataSet.Title: Elven Scout
DataSet.Text: Ranged.

DataSet.Title: Eowyn
DataSet.Text: Response: The first time a character is destroyed each round, Eowyn gains +2 Willpower until the end of the round.

DataSet.Title: Erkenbrand
DataSet.Text: Sentinel. Erkenbrand gains Block 1 against adjacent enemies.

DataSet.Title: Escort from Edoras
DataSet.Text: Moribund: Ready a Character that you control.

DataSet.Title: Ever Vigilant
DataSet.Text: Action: Ready a character you control.

DataSet.Title: Faramir
DataSet.Text: Ranged. Vanquish: Draw 1 card.

DataSet.Title: Favor of the Lady
DataSet.Text: Attach to a Character. Attached Character gets +1 Willpower.

DataSet.Title: Feint
DataSet.Text: Power: Reduce a non-unique Enemy to 0 Attack until the end of the phase.

DataSet.Title: Forest Snare
DataSet.Text: Attach to an enemy. Attached enemy is exhausted.

DataSet.Title: Elrond's Council
DataSet.Text: Action: Reduce your Threat by 2.

DataSet.Title: Frodo
DataSet.Text: Stealth. While Sauron has 0 resources, Frodo gets +2 Willpower.

DataSet.Title: Gaining Strength
DataSet.Text: Power: Gain 1 resource.

DataSet.Title: Galadhon Archer
DataSet.Text: Ranged. Arrival: Deal 1 damage to an Enemy.

DataSet.Title: Galadriel's Handmaiden
DataSet.Text: Arrival: Reduce your threat by 1.

DataSet.Title: Gandalf
DataSet.Text: Fleeting. Arrival: Choose one: Draw 3 cards, reduce your Threat by 3, or deal 3 damage to an Enemy.

DataSet.Title: Gandalf's Search
DataSet.Text: Action: Draw 2 cards.

DataSet.Title: Ghan-buri-ghan
DataSet.Text: Stealth. +1 willpower for each exhausted enemy in play.

DataSet.Title: Gimli
DataSet.Text: Stalwart. Response: After Gimli takes damage, he gains +2 Attack until the end of the round.

DataSet.Title: Gondorian Shield
DataSet.Text: Attach to a Gondor character. Attached character gets +2 Health and Block.

DataSet.Title: Grimbeorn
DataSet.Text: Block. Stalwart.

DataSet.Title: Guard of the Citadel
DataSet.Text: Sentinel.

DataSet.Title: Hasty Stroke
DataSet.Text: Action: Choose a character with a Weapon attachment to gain Protect.

DataSet.Title: Hidden Cache
DataSet.Text: Action: Gain 1 Resource.

DataSet.Title: Hobbit Cloak
DataSet.Text: Attach to a Hobbit Hero. Upkeep: Sauron loses 1 Resource.

DataSet.Title: Horseback Archer
DataSet.Text: Ranged.

DataSet.Title: Imladris Caregiver
DataSet.Text: Arrival: Heal 2 damage from a Character.

DataSet.Title: Ithilien Archer
DataSet.Text: Ranged. Ithilien Archer gets +1 ATK for each exhausted enemy.

DataSet.Title: Legacy Blade
DataSet.Text: Attached character gets +1 ATK for each resource in your pool. (Limit +3 ATK.)

DataSet.Title: Legolas
DataSet.Text: Ranged. Upkeep: Deal 1 damage to an Enemy.

DataSet.Title: Lembas
DataSet.Text: Action: Heal a character for 3 HP and grant ready.

DataSet.Title: Lorien's Wealth
DataSet.Text: Action: Draw Two Cards.

DataSet.Title: Mithrandir's Advice
DataSet.Text: Power: Draw 2 cards.

DataSet.Title: Parting Gifts
DataSet.Text: Action: Gain 1 Resource.

DataSet.Title: Quick Strike
DataSet.Text: Action: Choose a character to make an attack. That character gains Quick for this attack.

DataSet.Title: Raiment of War
DataSet.Text: Attached character gets +1 ATK, +2 hit points, and Block 1.

DataSet.Title: Rain of Arrows
DataSet.Text: Action: Deal 1 damage to each enemy in the staging area.

DataSet.Title: Ranger Spear
DataSet.Text: Attach to a Character. Attached Character gains +1 Attack. Response: When attached Character is attacked, deal 1 damage to attacking Enemy.

DataSet.Title: Reinforcements
DataSet.Text: Planning Action: Reduce the cost of each ally in your hand by 1.

DataSet.Title: Round Shield
DataSet.Text: Attach to a Character. Attached Character gains Block.

DataSet.Title: Sam Gamgee
DataSet.Text: Stalwart. While Sauron has 0 resources, Sam Gamgee gets +1 Attack, +1 Willpower, and Vigilant.

DataSet.Title: Secret Paths
DataSet.Text: Power: Apply 2 progress on an Objective.

DataSet.Title: Self Preservation
DataSet.Text: Attach to a Character. Upkeep: Heal 1 damage from attached Character.

DataSet.Title: Shield of Rohan
DataSet.Text: Attach to a Rohan character. Attached character gets +2 hit points and Stalwart.

DataSet.Title: Silvan Tracker
DataSet.Text: Arrival: Choose a character to gain Stealth until the end of the round.

DataSet.Title: Sneak Attack
DataSet.Text: Power: Put a random Ally into play under your control. That Ally gains Fleeting.

DataSet.Title: Star Brooch
DataSet.Text: Attached character gains Vigilant.

DataSet.Title: Sterner than Steel
DataSet.Text: Preparation: When a Character is attacked, that Character gains Protect.

DataSet.Title: Taste it Again!
DataSet.Text: Preparation: When an Enemy attacks, it takes damage equal to the target Character's Attack value. This damage is dealt before the Enemy's attack resolves.

DataSet.Title: The Tree People
DataSet.Text: Power: Return a Silvan Ally to the player's hand to put a random Silvan Ally into play.

DataSet.Title: Trollshaw Scout
DataSet.Text: Moribund: Exhaust a random enemy.

DataSet.Title: Unexpected Courage
DataSet.Text: Limited Action: If attached character defeats an enemy or objective, ready attached character.

DataSet.Title: Waters of Nimrodel
DataSet.Text: Action: Heal 3 damage to a Character.

DataSet.Title: Westfold Outrider
DataSet.Text: Arrival: Deal 2 damage to an adjacent enemy.

DataSet.Title: Woodland Courier
DataSet.Text: Arrival: Apply 1 progress to an Objective.

DataSet.Title: Zigil Miner
DataSet.Text: Action: Exhaust Zigil Miner to gain 1 resource.

DataSet.Title: Accursed Forest
DataSet.Text: Upkeep: Discard the top 3 cards from each player’s deck.

DataSet.Title: Ambush on the Shore
DataSet.Text: Guarded. Upkeep: Sauron gains 1 Resource per player.

DataSet.Title: Anduin Troll Spawn
DataSet.Text: Block.

DataSet.Title: Black Blood
DataSet.Text: Heal 2 damage from each Troll Enemy.

DataSet.Title: Blocked Path
DataSet.Text: Progress on other Objectives is not possible.

DataSet.Title: Caught in a Web
DataSet.Text: One of your party is trapped in a cocoon.

DataSet.Title: Chieftain Ufthak
DataSet.Text: Pursuit. End of round: Add 1 Dol Goldur Orcs at no cost.

DataSet.Title: Climb the Hill
DataSet.Text: Immediately travel to Bare Hilltop.

DataSet.Title: Cocoon
DataSet.Text: Save your trapped comrade.

DataSet.Title: Continue Downstream
DataSet.Text: Immediately travel to Mirkwood Swamp.

DataSet.Title: Creature of Darkness
DataSet.Text: End of round: increase Threat by 1.

DataSet.Title: Dark Sorcery
DataSet.Text: Preparation: Cancel the next event played.

DataSet.Title: Despair
DataSet.Text: After attached enemy attacks, raise threat by 1.

DataSet.Title: Devoured
DataSet.Text: Destroy a random equipment card attached to a hero.

DataSet.Title: Dol Guldur Orcs
DataSet.Text: Sentinel.

DataSet.Title: Driven By Shadow
DataSet.Text: Attached enemy gets +2 ATK.

DataSet.Title: Elite Dol Guldur Orcs
DataSet.Text: Vigilant.

DataSet.Title: Enfeebled
DataSet.Text: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

DataSet.Title: Escape the Forest
DataSet.Text: The players win the game.

DataSet.Title: Escape the Spiders’ Lair
DataSet.Text: Allow travel from this location.

DataSet.Title: Evil Storm
DataSet.Text: Discard each event in each player’s hand.

DataSet.Title: Exhaustion
DataSet.Text: Exhaust each wounded character.

DataSet.Title: Explore the Cave
DataSet.Text: Allow travel from this location.

DataSet.Title: Eyes of the Forest
DataSet.Text: Gain 1 resource for each ally in play.

DataSet.Title: Find Safe Passage
DataSet.Text: Allow travel from this location.

DataSet.Title: Find Shelter
DataSet.Text: Complete this stage.

DataSet.Title: Find the Path
DataSet.Text: Allow travel from this location.

DataSet.Title: Find The Raft
DataSet.Text: Allow travel from this location. The players cannot attack this objective while Hill Troll is in play.

DataSet.Title: FindYourBearings
DataSet.Text: Return the captured cards to their owner’s hand.

DataSet.Title: Find Your Friends
DataSet.Text: Allow travel from this location.

DataSet.Title: Follow Grimbeorn’s Trail
DataSet.Text: Allow travel from this location.

DataSet.Title: Follow the Stream
DataSet.Text: Immediately travel to Forest Stream.

DataSet.Title: Forest Flies
DataSet.Text: End of turn: Add 1 Forest Flies.

DataSet.Title: Gathering Gloom
DataSet.Text: Each Ally has their WP reduced to 0 until the end of the round.

DataSet.Title: Giant Spider
DataSet.Text: Sentinel.

DataSet.Title: Goblin Sniper
DataSet.Text: Stealth. Ranged.Upkeep: Deal 1 damage to a random character.

DataSet.Title: Growing Darkness
DataSet.Text: Upkeep: Sauron gains 1 resource.

DataSet.Title: Hidden Path
DataSet.Text: Allow travel from this location.

DataSet.Title: Hive Guardian
DataSet.Text: Sentinel. Counter 1.

DataSet.Title: Hunted
DataSet.Text: Choose one: Raise your threat by 1 for each ally you control, or discard an ally you control.

DataSet.Title: Investigate Smoke
DataSet.Text: Immediately travel to Abandoned Village.

DataSet.Title: Kingsfoil
DataSet.Text: Heal 2 damage from all characters

DataSet.Title: Lost In The Wilderness
DataSet.Text: Capture 2 random cards from each player's hand.

DataSet.Title: Louis
DataSet.Text: Unique. Each Troll enemy has Stalwart

DataSet.Title: Low on Supplies
DataSet.Text: Forced: After a player plays a card, raise that player’s threat by 1.

DataSet.Title: Marsh Adder
DataSet.Text: Unique. Stalwart. Vigilant. Forced: When Marsh Adder attacks, raise the defending player’s threat by 1.

DataSet.Title: Mirkwood Flock
DataSet.Text: Moribund: Sauron gains 1 resource.

DataSet.Title: Mirkwood Patrol
DataSet.Text: Sentinel.

DataSet.Title: Morris
DataSet.Text: Unique. Each Troll enemy has Block 1.

DataSet.Title: Muck Adder
DataSet.Text: Quick. Muck Adder attacks the character with the fewest remaining hit points.

DataSet.Title: Navigate the River
DataSet.Text: Allow travel from this location.

DataSet.Title: Orc Beastmaster
DataSet.Text: Arrival: Add 1 Orc Hound.

DataSet.Title: Orc Hound
DataSet.Text: Pursuit. All Orcs gain Pursuit.

DataSet.Title: Orc Marauder
DataSet.Text: Forced: When this enemy attacks, Sauron gains a resource.

DataSet.Title: Pack of Wargs
DataSet.Text: Pursuit. Upkeep: Pack of Wargs gets +1 HP.

DataSet.Title: Poisoned by Spiders
DataSet.Text: Preparation: The next character damaged but not destroyed by a Spider enemy attack cannot ready this round.

DataSet.Title: Pursued by Shadow
DataSet.Text: Preparation: Exhaust the next ally to enter play.

DataSet.Title: Pursuit on the Shore
DataSet.Text: Deal 1 damage to a random character. Repeat this effect for each enemy in play.

DataSet.Title: Rescue Grimbeorn
DataSet.Text: Take control of the Grimbeorn ally and immediately travel to The Carrock.

DataSet.Title: Rescue the Horses
DataSet.Text: Each player gains 2 resources

DataSet.Title: Rescue Your Friends
DataSet.Text: Return each captured hero to its owner’s hand.

DataSet.Title: Rupert
DataSet.Text: Unique. Each Troll enemy has +1 ATK.

DataSet.Title: Sacked
DataSet.Text: One random character is captured in a Troll Sack.

DataSet.Title: Search for a Path
DataSet.Text: Immediately travel to Overgrown Trail.

DataSet.Title: Spider Guard
DataSet.Text: Sentinel

DataSet.Title: Spider Queen
DataSet.Text: Unique.  Spider Hatchlings get +1 ATK and Sentinel.Upkeep: Put a Spider Hatchlings into play.

DataSet.Title: Spiders of Mirkwood
DataSet.Text: Sentinel.

DataSet.Title: Spooked Horses
DataSet.Text: Your frightened horses run off with some of your supplies. Each player loses 2 resources.

DataSet.Title: Squashed into Jelly
DataSet.Text: Discard each Troll Sack and raise each player’s threat by 2 for each Troll Sack discarded.

DataSet.Title: Stuart
DataSet.Text: Unique. Upkeep: Heal 1 damage from each Troll enemy.

DataSet.Title: The Necromancer's Reach
DataSet.Text: Each enemy gets +1 ATK permanently.

DataSet.Title: Thick Webs
DataSet.Text: Forced: After an ally enters play, exhaust it.

DataSet.Title: Treacherous Fog
DataSet.Text: Preparation: After a player plays a card, discard 1 random card from his hand.

DataSet.Title: Tribulation
DataSet.Text: Deal 1 damage to each ally.

DataSet.Title: Troll Sack
DataSet.Text: Rescue the captured character.

DataSet.Title: Turned Around
DataSet.Text: Restore each objective to full quest points.

DataSet.Title: Under the Shadow
DataSet.Text: Attached enemy gets +2 HP.

DataSet.Title: Under the Watchful Eye
DataSet.Text: Each player’s hand size is reduced to 5.

DataSet.Title: Ungoliant's Brood
DataSet.Text: End of turn: Each Spider gets +1 HP.

DataSet.Title: Ungoliant's Spawn
DataSet.Text: Unique. Vigilant. Stalwart

DataSet.Title: Unwavering
DataSet.Text: Attached enemy gains Stalwart.

DataSet.Title: Veteran
DataSet.Text: Attached enemy gains Block 1.

DataSet.Title: Veteran Patrol
DataSet.Text: Sentinel.

DataSet.Title: Vicious Speed
DataSet.Text: Attached enemy gains Vigilant.

DataSet.Title: Vile Spawn
DataSet.Text: Ungoliant's Spawn heals all damage.

DataSet.Title: Warg Riders
DataSet.Text: Pursuit. Each Orc gains pursuit.

DataSet.Title: Wargs
DataSet.Text: Vigilant. Aggressive 1.

DataSet.Title: Watchful Eyes
DataSet.Text: Threatening

DataSet.Title: Watchful Scout
DataSet.Text: Take control of Elven Scout.

DataSet.Title: Wild Bear
DataSet.Text: Pursuit. Stalwart.
